name: Studybot
body:
### Welcome to Studybot
Studybot is a web app for students. They learn easily how to programm and they enjoy it. It's for free and contact me, when you have any questions.

### Requirements
* A web server with PhP Version 5.x
* (MySql - Server 5.5)

### Why is it free?
I've made it for free, because the ability to learn something may not be cost. Everybody have the permission to learn. I don't want to stop them by telling them top pay for my software.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
